o jogo é ótimo, tem uma atmosfera muito boa e é perfeito para se jogar com amigos, mas com 4 anos o jogo ainda tem muitos bugs, hitbox totalmente vantajosa pro killer, se arrumarem isso o jogo fica 10.

nota 7/10

el juego me encanta, si venís de un juego competitivo estresante llámese csgo, lol, etc. es lo mejor para relajar, eso si tiene sus problemas como todo juego, los bugs son constantes muy pocas veces hay tan graves como los hitbox de la 4.5, pero generalmente se van solucionando con el tiempo, el juego es complicado al inicio, ya que cuesta mucho aprender las mecanicas del juego y acostumbrarse, en los rangos marrones es muy estresante el juego y todos se esconden y no hacen motores, en rangos verdes la mayoria trollean o solo hacen misiones muy raro escapar los 4, ya en rangos morados se la toman enserio y las partidas son mas rapidas y generalmente hay pocos trolls, y en rangos rojos ya la cosa cambia mucho, el gen rush esta siempre presente y la gente es mas madura al jugar, es un juego para dedicarle horas y horas en aprender si pensas en que este juego vas a dominarlo en 3 partidas olvidate, por todo lo demas es uno de los mejores juegos que jugue en mi vida, y de hecho invite a 3 primos a jugarlo, por lo que lo seguiria recomendando por mucho tiempo mas todavia,
喜欢这种逃生类的游戏 很不错

Fun game but here's the problems:

1) Finding a match can be annoying

2) Prepare for survivors to gen rush (which means they all hang out in a group and go after the generators needed to open the gate to escape)

3) Some killers are tougher to use than others. Don't take the game's word for it when it rates them in difficulty.

The game is fairly fun as survivor because you don't always expect to win but not as fun as killer because you'll be grouped with high ranking survivors that stomp you out. It makes the game less fun as killer and tedious constantly playing survivor. Playing survivor with friends makes the game much more tolerable and enjoyable. However, there are a lot of bugs and long queue times as killer. First 20 hours is fun with a friend or alone and the rest just seem blank. I mean, games still pretty fun though.

The best part of this game is sitting on a generator and then out of no where, getting picked up by Michael Myers with no audio indication that he is by you and then he proceeds to camp the hook that he puts you on until you die. Finally, you have to wait 10 minutes for your friends to finish up so you can play another game and have the same thing happen to only you but this time with Ghost Face :)

10/10

Game is involved in too many controversies for me to give this a positive review, including rampant cheating that is ignored by the developers, having a public test beta with tons of bugs that never get patched (so what's the point), and contributing to the creation of NFTs.

Controversies aside, this game's balance is infuriating to play around. Killers are severely overwhelmed by survivors in the current state of the game, and there is very little one can do to fight against four survivors in a Discord call using meta perks.
Багованая, но пойдет)

If you like games where the developers ignore constant community feedback on the amount of bugs and balance needed in the game, this is the game for you. If you enjoy an extremely toxic community, this is the game for you. If you like sellout "content creators," this is the game for you. On a real note, this is game is not balanced, the developers ignore bugs that have been in the game since launch. They ignore and bash the community asking constantly for improvements such as colorblind support, matchmaking balancing, bug fixes, and overall health for the game to thrive.
Incredible, no game has gripped my like this one!

После 100+ часов игры. 
Матчмейкинг полное дерьмо. Тебе кидает либо игроков которых ты в принципе не можешь выиграть, либо игроков с которыми скучно играть. Интересных матчей единицы. 
Играл за убийцу. Без нужных перков на высоких ранках ты просто мальчик для битья. Хочешь перки - выфарми еще 100+ часов херового геймплея или заплати. Возможности навязать свою игру не превращая всё в скучное патрулирование 3 генераторов просто нет. 
Не стоит своих денег даже по скидке.

Damasiados errores para un juego que fue publicado en 2015. errores como, error inesperado, no tienes conexión a internet, ha ocurrido un error al guardar tu clasificación justo después de que logras escapar x una trampilla y lograr un aseso en la clasificación y 40k de puntos de sangre es simplemente un abuso. Se admite para un fornite o demás juegos ftp pero uno de pago y de 2015 simplemente no se puede admitir. Es una idea grandiosa y en la práctica es un juego divertido, pero la cantidad de errores y la poca ayuda y soporte me hacen no recomendar este juego, a menos que sea gratis!

топ игра

The game is deceptively fun. I always put off buying it because whenever I would watch streamers playing I wasn't convinced the gameplay loop would keep me entertained. It was only when I got it on sale did I realize what I hadn't considered, that the progression systems were half the fun. I'm really enjoying playing every match because I'm constantly setting small goals and scenarios to complete daily rituals and challenges. So far, me and my friends are loving it, and its spooky and exciting to boot!

I think its a great game with a few flaws, but thats expected. Before you give up on your first hours, just keep in mind that its going to be very very painful, but after you get the knowladge you need, it will be more fun. And for gods sake remember that the game is supposed to be killer sided since you have to survive against them.

The balancing has come a long way, and has become quite competitive. The players for the most part are pretty decent and the graphics are sharp. The killer list is expanding at a great rate. Would like to see more power going to killers sometime in the future.
While I do recommend this game, there are a few issues. Some of them involve positioning difference for both the survivor and the killer. For the survivor, it seems as though the killer is slighty further than they actually are. this results in survivors thinking they can perform an action and avoid a hit. This can either make or break a game. The other issue is that the killers have recived several nerfs from the devs that have hampered some of the perks that where already on the fair spectrum. This has allowed a lot of people's playing styles to either stop or completely rework them.
I think something that would allow for a lot of benefit for both sides would be buff other perks to increase variety so other players aren't stuck in a loop of only select meta perks.
